title: TinyXP East Asian Language Support
description:
Yes, you read right.  These files enable TinyXP to run East Asian Language Support.

"MultiLanguageSetup.txt" is the install guide, please read it before attempting to install.

Tested on

TinyXP Rev06
TinyXP Rev07(Vista Ed)
TinyXP Rev09

XP Home SP2
XP Pro SP2 & SP3

Thanks go out to UltimateSephiroth for the awsome font, and The-Duck for some of the language files.

I suspect that this will work on any of the modified XP distros.  If you find one that turns out not to work, please post the files needed, so that I may update the torrent.
